translations: v.从下部切开（undercut 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 根切, 过度切割, 运动失真, 底切作用
价格削减, 价格削低, 削价出售

sentences.sentence: But deep-rooted problems are undercutting its status.
sentences.translation: 但一些根深蒂固的问题正在削弱美元的这一地位。

sentences.sentence: Asda simply says it will keep undercutting all similar competitors by 10%.
sentences.translation: 艾思达公司只是简单地回应它的售价将保持比所有同类对手的价格低10%。

sentences.sentence: Suppliers must co-ordinate without negotiation on a mutually profitable price, then stop anybody undercutting it.
sentences.translation: 供应商必须在对双方有利的价格下达成默契的合作，而且任何一方都不可以事先降价。
